RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEEP DIAMOND TM ran down leader. EYESA STREAKER well clear, fast fade. LUNA TEEK wide trip, gaining. SUPER BLACK DUCK chased, no rally. JIORGINO rail trip, no gain. INDIAN GIVER BLUE broke in sharply.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 250 Y Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 8400. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESSONESWEETGOCAR strengthening strides. HUNTERS SWINGIN REBA sharp, nipped. TTT MY WINGS dueled, denied. TTT JESS IVAN stumbled outward.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 300 Y Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 4500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JMG SPECIAL CAPO long duel, won bob. EVELIN FLY WITH ME fought,outnodded. LOUISIANA SASS in mix, outkicked. WET PAINT DRIPS close up throughout. VP FIRST DOWN CORONA bid between, outfinished. SHAKE FIVE tardy break. MR WESLACO weakened.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 5200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GONE wouldnt be denied. HTR TEQUILLA MIAMOR broke inward, close up. INSEPERABLEBABY bold bid, not enough. JESS SET THE BAR lost path early. HARD EVIDENZ urged, empty. BIG DADDYS BLUE bobbled break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 300 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 7000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR CARTER strong finish. HEZ PRETTY FAST off best, caught. OH HEZ FAST contentded, denied. CARTEL PETE close up, weakened. MP MISSLILROCKSTAR floated in early. INPHINITY evenly outside. EYESA TEMPTRESS bid, gave way. TF IM THAT LADY never levelled. BAD AS U CAN BE broke inward. FAMOUS PILOT POINT dancing, leaped, lost jock.

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Hez Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Schaefer Sr Clinton and Schaefer Jr Clinton

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 250 Y Dirt CR: 86. Optional Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEATURED PROSPECT proved best in duel. JJ CORONAS SNOW dueled every step. FIVE BAR JOY in hunt, outfinished. TF RUNAWAY KATE unable to match stride. RECOGNIZE stumbled badly break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 400 Y Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORONAS COURAGE dueled, won the nod. SOMEKINDA PATRIOT sharp, nipped at wire. CAPTAIN TLC AW changed lane, closed fast. SHES RACEY in mix, outfinished. POLITICAL ANYWHERE bid, faded. UKANKISSMEGOODBY AW onepaced. TEMPTINGMACHO clean trip, weakened. MR RAGLEY KID no response. MY FIRST EAGLE off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Somekinda Patriot
ENTRY.OWNER: Potts Tarsha and Cole Cathlyn M

ENTRY.NAME: Political Anywhere
ENTRY.OWNER: Contreras Juan Jose and Solis Maria
